entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet run -p:Configuration=Release` looks for assets in `bin/Debug` #36521
    6.0-rc2
  • ARM64 support in AspNetCoreModuleV2 #36519
  • High CPU usage with dotnet watch on an F# project #36514
  • Build VS redist package for ANCM #36513
  • Add `DateOnly` and `TimeOnly` string query parameter support #36511
  • Impossible to compile a project targeting net6.0-windows when referencing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing 6.0.0-rc.1.* #36510
  • Kestrel rejects requests with non standard ASCII characters #36509
  • Support Pointer Events in Blazor #36508
  • [Blazor .Net 6 RC1] PreRender: Has ComponentApplicationState been renamed/changed namespace? #36507
  • Route handlers throw System.Text.Json.JsonReader exception for requests with invalid JSON body rather than returning 422 #36499
    6.0-rc2
  • VS Code: Type "@DateTime" in the _layout.cshtml , the color of this symbol is incorrect. #36495
  • [Blazor-wasm] Continuation of: Lazy loading of application areas #5465 #36493

Closed

  • dotnet-openapi refresh does not truncate json documents. #35767
  • Publish Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements #36454
    6.0.0
  • "DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement" is not respecting "AuthorizationOptions.InvokeHandlersAfterFailure" #35610
    Discussions
  • Error using a generated razor class in any other class #36265
    6.0.0
  • Use Roslyn C# Formatting Service Directly #33951
    17.0-Preview5
  • Mac: dotnet dev-certs https --trust does not explain how to undo this #4102
    7.0-preview1
  • Startup regression: json #36294
  • HTTP/3: Document Kestrel requirements #34488
    6.0-rc2
  • Avoid Creating AuthenticationHeaderValue #36506
  • Find if session is expired with HttpContext #36090
    Discussions
  • Fix minimal APIs behavior with duplicate endpoint and route names #35436
    6.0-rc2
  • 404 page with FallbackPolicy #35922
    Discussions
  • There is no `Retry` button in the page after reconnection to the server for blazor server project #32545
    6.0-rc2
  • Razor component doesn't render anymore after hot reload first try #36393
  • blazor _httpContextAccessor.HttpContext null #36498
  • Test issue for Blazor stuff please ignore #36502
  • .NET 6.0 ASP.NET MVC DataAnnotations #36437
  • Uncaught pause_on_uncaught #36497
  • SupplyParameterFromQueryAttribute is long-winded and verbose #36494
  • How to pass a ComponentApplicationState to a component under test with bUnit? #35928
    6.0.0
  • [Question/Bug] EmptyBodyBehavior.Allow behavior #36466

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert setting endpoint name automatically #36518
    area-web-frameworks
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #36517
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #36516
  • Avoid using TargetFramework in build targets #36512
    area-mvc
  • Add support for BindAsync without ParameterInfo #36505
    area-web-frameworks
  • Improve documentation #36496
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update http3 RequiresPreviewFeatures attributes with message/URL #36491
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Make DelegateEndpointConventionBuilder constructors public #36492
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Identity UI fix razor content #36479
    area-identity, 6.0-rc2
  • Clarify InvokeHandlersAfterFailure #36501
    area-security, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `796e436` to `a64c11d` #36459
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Improve error message #36442
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0-preview1
  • Backport `Fix Blazor Server Reconnection Mechanism` (#36126) #36489
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Cherry-pick mismatched parameter optionality analyzer and clean up directories #36379
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Check for duplicate endpoint names on startup #36488
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/5.0] Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now #36504
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Blazor Server Reconnection Mechanism #36126
    area-signalr, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now #36500
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Honor sliding expiration in the security stamp validator #36394
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] fix - Authority URL fix for blazor webassesmbly project #36462
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • Update SDK #36470
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now #36503
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Use HttpMethods.IsGet #36441
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Check for duplicate endpoint names on startup #36353
    area-runtime
  • Update build.gradle #36478
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Stop using unencrypted git protocol in build.gradle #36476
    area-signalr
  • Don't ignore XML doc warnings for Polly #36485
    area-runtime
  • PR benchmarks #36309
    area-perf
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #36100
    area-infrastructure
  • Dougbu/check.solution.filters #36449
    area-infrastructure
  • Simplify Guid reading code in DataProtection #36403
    area-dataprotection
  • Quarantine failing test #36473
    area-runtime
  • Catch exception in TryConvertTo #33594
    area-blazor, community-contribution, .NET 7 Planning
  • fix - Authority URL fix for blazor webassesmbly project #36460
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Expose ParameterInfo for Minimal Actions API Explorer #36439
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • WIP: Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
